content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is a process of hiring people as non-employees, i.e.: people who are not yet employees (with only NDA signed), but with whom EPAM would like to start working on training/onboarding and keep them engaged as potential remote/office candidates with the limited access to EPAM internal applications. In order to distinguish them from users with other Profile Type (Contractors, Students, Employees), the following combination of attributes is set in the person's People profile:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Profile Type = EPAM Club Member;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engagement Type = 'Ultra Flex' \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"or\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" 'Ultra Office'.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon as an appropriate project position is found for an \\\"Ultra candidate\\\", (s)he is converted from EPAM Club Member to Employee (Contractor) through a specific request submitted at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/bKirPg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Transformation request: EPAM Club member to Employee/Contractor\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" you will learn the actions required from your side when employment status is changed EPAM Club Member with Ultra Flex / Ultra Office engagement types\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
